item.title: Ethereum Deposit Trend Eases, with CEX Inflow Narrowed to 46,000 ETH in the Last 24 Hours
item.description: On August 22nd, according to Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, the total net inflow of ETH on CEX was 46,000 ETH. The top three CEXs in terms of inflow volume are as follows:· Binance, with an inflow of 67,900 ETH;· Kraken, with an inflow of 7,142.29 ETH;· Coinbase Pro, with an inflow of 3,131.98 ETH.In addition, Bitfinex witnessed an outflow of 17,100 ETH and ranked first in the outflow list.

item.title: EU officials are considering issuing a digital Euro on public blockchains such as Ethereum or Solana.
item.description: August 22nd. As per the Financial Times, sources disclosed that the latest stablecoin legislation in the US has given rise to concerns regarding the competitive stance of the European digital currency. European Union officials are expediting the planning of the digital euro. Last month, the US Congress passed a landmark Genius Act to regulate the $288 billion market dominated by the US dollar in the stablecoin market. A person involved in the discussions indicated that since the enactment of this legislation, EU officials have been "reconsidering the plans for the digital euro."The sources further added that due to privacy concerns, officials are currently contemplating running the digital euro on public blockchains like Ethereum or Solana instead of the previously anticipated private blockchain.

item.title: A certain new address has added 11,950 ETH to its holdings, worth over $51 million.
item.description: On August 22nd, as monitored by lookonchain, a newly established wallet address 0x2607 has just made a withdrawal of 11,950 ETH from Binance. The value of this withdrawal is $51.32 million.

item.title: A certain new address has added 1,046 BTC to its holdings, worth nearly $120 million.
item.description: On August 22nd, as monitored by OnchainLens, a newly established wallet address received 1,046 BTC from Binance approximately 20 minutes ago. The value of this amount is approximately $118.22 million.Address: bc1qcn6y873qtmjquh5x6zl0r2lcqgufpn9d9nae0q.

item.title: Million-Follower KOL Andrew Tate Shorts YZY for a Floating Profit of $12,600
item.description: On August 22, with YZY continuing to decline and falling below $0.8, the multimillion-follower Key Opinion Leader (KOL) Andrew Tate opened a 3x short position in YZY on Hyperliquid this morning at 3:16. Currently, it is showing an unrealized profit of $12,600. His opening price was $0.8523, and the initial position size was $175,000.

item.title: A whale has increased its holdings by 537.66 BTC over the past two weeks, worth over $60 million.
item.description: Update, August 22nd: Based on the monitoring of OnchainLens, a whale received an additional 71 BTC from FalconX today, which is approximately worth $8.05 million. This whale has accumulated a total of 537.66 BTC in the past two weeks, with a total value of around $60.85 million.Address: bc1qgz8daweegcsqgkp7cc36jlkprt0n55cuqh7sgsr09st9fpnhvfxqccgtlw.

item.title: OKAY has dropped nearly 30% in the last 4 hours, bringing its market cap down to $9.57 million.
item.description: On August 22nd, within a period of 4 hours, the X Layer ecosystem meme coin OKAY experienced a sharp decline of nearly 30%. Its market value dropped to $9.57 million, and the 24-hour trading volume reached $7.9 million.BlockBeats hereby reminds users: Meme coins are highly volatile. Please pay attention to asset protection.

item.title: Yesterday's US Ethereum Spot ETF Net Inflow: $2.876 billion
item.description: On August 22nd, according to Farside data, yesterday the net inflow of the US Ethereum spot ETF was $287.6 million, bringing an end to a four-day net outflow trend. The specific details are as follows:The net inflow of ETHA was $233.6 million, the net inflow of FETH was $28.5 million, the net inflow of ETHW was $7 million, the net inflow of ETHV was $6.2 million, the net inflow of ETHE was $5.9 million, and the net inflow of Grayscale ETH was $6.4 million.

item.title: Yesterday, the US Spot Bitcoin ETF saw a net outflow of $1.944 billion
item.description: On August 22nd, as per Farside's monitoring, yesterday the net outflow of the US spot Bitcoin ETF was $194.4 million, indicating the fifth consecutive day of net outflows. Here is the breakdown:The net outflow of IBIT was $127.5 million. The net outflow of ARKB was $43.3 million. The net outflow of FBTC was $31.8 million. The net inflow of EZBC was $3.2 million. And the net inflow of Grayscale BTC was $5.2 million.

item.title: Solana ecosystem privacy protocol Vanish has completed a $1 million Pre-Seed round of funding, with Colosseum leading the investment.
item.description: On August 22nd, the privacy protocol Vanish within the Solana ecosystem announced the completion of a $1 million Pre-Seed financing round. This financing round was led by Colosseum, and it saw the participation of Solana Ventures, Pivot Global, as well as multiple industry-leading angel investors including Solana co-founder toly.In Solana, every transaction requires a trade-off between privacy, compliance, and execution. Vanish enables instantaneous private execution, avoiding the risk of traders being exposed to front-runners or back-runners, thereby reducing the value of their strategies.
